entry.title: Golang how to unmarshal a subset of nested JSON data

link.title: Golang how to unmarshal a subset of nested JSON data

entry.summary: Have you ever face a case when you need to get nested data from a JSON object? I think we face this scenario all the time when we deal with third-party APIs regularly we use JSON unmarshaling to a struct that contains another struct was the only obvious way, But today I’m happy to introduce a new option with NJSON package, an option that gives us the ability and flexibility to unmarshal any ...
